text: Friendship College is a former college that lasted from 1891-1981. The college was in Rock Hill, South Carolina. One player from the school, Harthorne Wingo played in the NBA and was an NBA Finals champion. ==See also== *Friendship Nine == References == Category:1891 establishments in South Carolina Category:1981 disestablishments in South Carolina Category:Educational institutions established in 1891 Category:Educational institutions disestablished in 1981 Category:Rock Hill, South Carolina Category:Defunct private universities and colleges in South Carolina
title: Friendship College
